doc:
Robert Viharo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Viharo 0 Robert Viharo (born August 14, 1942) is an American actor. He made an early appearance in 1966 as Harry in Dark Shadows. He is notable for his role in Valley of the Dolls in 1967. playing the part of a Broadway Director. He had the starring role as Zachary Kane in the 1977 action film Bare Knuckles. He also played the part of Col. Ernesto Dorio in the 1989 film Romero. Robert_Viharo ( born August_14 , 1942 ) is an_American_actor . He made an_early_appearance in 1966 as Harry in Dark_Shadows . He is notable for his_role in Valley of the_Dolls in 1967 . playing the_part of a_Broadway_Director . He had the_starring_role as Zachary_Kane in the_1977_action_film_Bare_Knuckles . He also played the_part of Col._Ernesto_Dorio in the_1989_film_Romero .
